verses.verse: He that dasheth in <S%H6327>pieces<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H6440>thee<s%>: <S%H5341>keep<s%> the <S%H4694>fortress<s%>, <S%H6822>watch<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%>, make thy <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H2388>strong<s%>, <S%H553>fortify<s%> thy <S%H3581>power<s%> <S%H3966>mightily<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7725>restoreth<s%> the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, as the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for the <S%H1238>emptiers<s%> have emptied them <S%H1238>out<s%>, and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> their <S%H2156>vine-branches<s%>.

The <S%H4043>shield<s%> of his mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> is made <S%H119>red<s%>, the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> are in <S%H8529>scarlet<s%>: the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H784>flash<s%> with <S%H6393>steel<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H3559>preparation<s%>, and the cypress <S%H1265>spears<s%> are <S%H7477>brandished<s%>.

The <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H1984>rage<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>; they <S%H8264>rush<s%> to and fro in the broad <S%H7339>ways<s%>: the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of them is like <S%H3940>torches<s%>; they <S%H7323>run<s%> like the <S%H1300>lightnings<s%>.

He <S%H2142>remembereth<s%> his <S%H117>nobles<s%>: they <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in their <S%H1979>march<s%>; they make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5526>thereof<s%>, and the mantelet is <S%H3559>prepared<s%>.
The <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> are <S%H6605>opened<s%>, and the <S%H1964>palace<s%> is <S%H4127>dissolved<s%>.

And it is <S%H5324>decreed<s%>: she is <S%H1540>uncovered<s%>, she is carried <S%H5927>away<s%>; and her <S%H519>handmaids<s%> <S%H5090>moan<s%> as with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3123>doves<s%>, <S%H8608>beating<s%> upon their <S%H3824>breasts<s%>.

But <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> hath been from of <S%H3117>old<s%> like a <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>: yet they flee <S%H5127>away<s%>. <S%H5975>Stand<s%>, <S%H5975>stand<s%>, they <S%H6437>cry<s%>; but none looketh back.

Take ye the <S%H962>spoil<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, take the <S%H962>spoil<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>; for there is no <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8498>store<s%>, the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of all <S%H2532>goodly<s%> <S%H3627>furniture<s%>.

She is <S%H950>empty<s%>, and <S%H4003>void<s%>, and <S%H1110>waste<s%>; and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melteth<s%>, and the <S%H1290>knees<s%> smite <S%H6375>together<s%>, and <S%H2479>anguish<s%> is in all <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of them all are <S%H6908>waxed<s%> <S%H6289>pale<s%>.

Where is the <S%H4583>den<s%> of the <S%H738>lions<s%>, and the <S%H4829>feeding-place<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions<s%>, where the <S%H738>lion<s%> and the <S%H738>lioness<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%>, the <S%H3833>lion<s%>'s <S%H1482>whelp<s%>, and none made them <S%H2729>afraid<s%>?

The <S%H738>lion<s%> did tear in <S%H2963>pieces<s%> <S%H1767>enough<s%> for his <S%H1484>whelps<s%>, and <S%H2614>strangled<s%> for his <S%H3833>lionesses<s%>, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H2356>caves<s%> with <S%H2964>prey<s%>, and his <S%H4585>dens<s%> with <S%H2966>ravin<s%>.

Behold <S%H5002><s%>, I am against thee, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and I will <S%H1197>burn<s%> her <S%H7393>chariots<s%> in the <S%H6227>smoke<s%>, and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> thy young <S%H3715>lions<s%>; and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> thy <S%H2964>prey<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H4397>messengers<s%> shall no more be <S%H8085>heard<s%>.
